content:
Got it! I've got your reminders scheduled:

* 6:30 am: Morning Coffee Reminder
* 2:00 pm: Afternoon Pick-me-up Reminder

You can set these reminders on your phone, calendar, or planner to help you stay on track. Just make sure to set the reminders to go off at the right times so you can start your day off right and get a boost in the afternoon.

Here's a quick summary of your morning routine:

* 6:30 am: Morning coffee reminder
* 6:30 am - 7:15 am: Get ready
* 7:15 am: Head out the door

And don't forget your afternoon pick-me-up reminder at 2:00 pm!

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
